segments.text: I'm observing the two children, and they are definitely up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar, pulling out what I assume are cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself smiling at their sneaky operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, looking up with such eager anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, clearly ready to receive her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together like a well-oiled, mischievous team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, right under the nose of the busy adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of those fresh cookies makes me feel a little happy for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, or worse, fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their secret mission is quite bold, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR
